You’ve seen it before. Probably. It’s “Totally Not Malware,” it’s a silly meme that asks for your credit card information. Well, I decided to make it a reality in 2017. It’s not implemented securely at all, but hey, it works.

Here’s the source code, feel free to do whatever (as long as it’s not actually scamming people!): http://localhost:4000/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/creditcard.7z
